sourcesContent:
import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-services', standalone:true, imports:[CommonModule], templateUrl: './services.component.html', styleUrls: ['./services.component.scss'] }) export class ServicesComponent { services = [ { title: 'Software Development', desc: 'Scalable custom software built for performance and growth.', icon: 'assets/icons/software.svg' }, { title: 'Web Development', desc: 'High-performance web applications with modern UX.', icon: 'assets/icons/web.svg' }, { title: 'Mobile App Development', desc: 'iOS & Android apps built with scalability in mind.', icon: 'assets/icons/mobile.svg' }, { title: 'SaaS Development', desc: 'Secure and scalable SaaS platforms.', icon: 'assets/icons/saas.svg' }, { title: 'UI/UX Design', desc: 'User-first design for better engagement.', icon: 'assets/icons/design.svg' }, { title: 'DevOps & Cloud', desc: 'CI/CD, cloud infra, and monitoring.', icon: 'assets/icons/devops.svg' } ]; steps = [ { id: 1, title: 'Requirement Analysis', desc: 'Understanding your needs.' }, { id: 2, title: 'Planning', desc: 'Roadmap & timelines.' }, { id: 3, title: 'Development', desc: 'Agile implementation.' }, { id: 4, title: 'Launch & Support', desc: 'Go-live & maintenance.' } ]; }

Software Consulting Services

Strategic software consulting to help you plan, build, modernize, and scale digital solutions with confidence.

Get Free Consultation View All Services

What We Offer

Technology Consulting

Right tech stack selection aligned with business goals.

Product Strategy

Roadmap planning, MVP strategy & scalability guidance.

Architecture Review

Code, performance, and security assessment.

Digital Transformation

Legacy modernization and cloud readiness.

Why Choose SailorTech

  • ✔ 10+ years of consulting experience
  • ✔ Business-first approach
  • ✔ Senior architects & consultants
  • ✔ Transparent engagement model
